title: SENILE CHINA JOE: Biden brags to the whole world that he “came to the United States Senate 120 years ago”
cleaned_text:
SENILE CHINA JOE: Biden brags to the whole world that he “came to the United States Senate 120 years ago”

Straight from China Joe’s lips during the long-awaited first news conference and lackluster State of the Union Address: “We should go back to a position of the filibuster that existed just when I came to the United States Senate a hundred and twenty years ago.” Yes, your mental capacity is that of a man 120 years old, Joe. We’ll give you that. You’ve definitely got “one foot in the grave” with all that dementia.

Joe Biden must love canola oil, margarine, tap water, vaccines and animal fat, because the Parkinson’s and Alzheimer’s are kicking into full gear, all while his fingertips massage our nuclear warhead arsenal, with his CCP cohorts standing next to terror-squad-Obama and Nazi-sympathizer-Soros, looking over his shoulder.

Biden added, “So, the best way to get something done, if you, if you hold near and dear to you, that you uh, um, like to be able to, uh, well, anyway.” That folks, is the BEST way to get things done in Washington DC. That’s the best strategy, according to the current President of the United States of America, who just took office, and expresses these ultra-important topics at the very first speech to America and the world (since he first sat at his stolen oval office desk, over two months ago).

Prepare yourself to listen to the new Marxist leader of the not-so-free-anymore world, who’s gone senile and cannot remember the beginning of any long sentence he begins.

How will this senile “leadership” affect the health and safety of Americans?

As China Joe’s mental capacity deteriorates even further with each passing day, so does the condition of the nation’s economy, financial well-being, health services and safety. That’s why Natural News covers much of the politics, because current events are spilling over into major concerns regarding health and safety.

For starters, printing trillions of dollars to bail out failed Blue States only sets us all up for skyrocketing inflation, which will directly raise the prices of some of our most vital resources – organic food and natural medicine.

Next, senile Joe wants mandatory vaccinations nationwide and that’s why they’re pushing for Nazi-style vaccine passports. The mRNA vaccine series is a genocidal weapon of mass destruction, and the main goal of the Marxists leading senile CCP Joe is to exterminate at least a third of the US population, then control the rest as sick, moronic, drugged-up peons begging for free stuff.

Of course, Google and the Tech Giants are leading the way with the ultimate disinformation campaign across the entire internet, worldwide, so nobody ever knows the truth about anything ever again. Not history. Not current events. Not the future. It will all be scripted, narrated and twisted to fit the communist agenda of China Joe’s puppeteers.

7 Stages of dementia: China Joe’s cognitive decline is like a landslide approaching the steep cliff of stage 5

China Joe is clearly currently in stage 4 of the 7 stages of dementia. His communication skills, speech, focus, concentration, reasoning, judgment, memory of old and recent events, and visual perceptions are ALL severely compromised already. We see that in every speech or virtual meeting, especially when he tries to shoot from the hip and go off script. China Joe is experiencing moderate cognitive decline right now, in early stage dementia, also known as stage 4 of 7.

In the course of the next few weeks and months, Joe Biden will experience RPDs, or rapidly progressive dementias, that are very difficult to treat. Right now, high doses of medication are staving off the inevitable, but that is about to end with the next landslide and advancement into stage 5 dementia. China Joe probably has less than 4 to 8 years to live, and only about 2 more where he even knows his own name.

The build-up of toxic proteins in his brain, combined with nerve damage, are sending him into moderately-severe cognitive decline, and immediately following that, severe cognitive decline, that includes delusions, anxiety and forgetting names of immediate family members. We already see signs of stage 7 in China Joe, as he has trouble walking, climbing stairs and remembering names of top officials in the US government and military.

China Joe’s cognitive decline is like a landslide. It’s just a matter of time before they replace him with a fake-digital-avatar-hologram, or did they already? Folks, we’re just days or weeks away from inaugurating a President Harris. Tune your internet frequency to HealthFreedom.news for updates on how the mRNA vaccine actually spreads disease, disorder and death, rather than preventing it all.
